title: 管理帮我删了谢谢
author: 幽儿~
txt_content:
"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."

replies.author: 论坛好网友
replies.txt_content:
标题: 管理帮我删了谢谢 本帖最后由 CaveIn 于 2016-11-7 10:40 编辑 

我马上要六级了。
我就想法自己服务器帖子。
没别的想法，大哥们
大姐们 ？
我先在这里谢谢了。帮我水一下
慢慢做任务吧，我就是这么升到六级的。

replies.author: 子弹～
replies.txt_content:
宣传的吸引人点
比如标题党
额你还差73点呢慢慢加油

replies.author: Because.
replies.txt_content:
茶馆禁止求助攻




--------“支配与被支配的人，是否会心生恨意？
